about_the_game:
This is the demo for the aquatic metroidvania 5 Star Fishy.

Features:

-The Tutorial

-Zone 1: The Tropical Shallows

-Some Unlockable Lore
detailed_description:
This is the demo for the aquatic metroidvania 5 Star Fishy.

Features:

-Zone 1: The Tropical Shallows

name: 5 Star Fishy Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 11+
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-10750H CPU @ 2.60GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel(R) UHDD Graphics/NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060
  • Storage: 264 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
  • VR Support: No
  • Additional Notes: This is only what I know works, feel free to test it on lower spec computers.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 11+
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-10750H CPU @ 2.60GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel(R) UHDD Graphics/NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060
  • Storage: 264 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
  • VR Support: No
  • Additional Notes: This is only what I know works, feel free to test it on lower spec computers.
